typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		storeId as short,
		productCode as string,
		quantity as short,
		logQuantity as double,
		advertising as boolean,
		price as double,
		weekStarting as date,
		id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RetailSalesSource
source(output(
		id as string,
		productCode as string,
		basePrice as string,
		wholeSaleCost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
RetailSalesSource, source1 join(RetailSalesSource@productCode == source1@id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
